name: Nowhere National Park 📸
description:
It's been a while since I've left home and gone out for a hiking trip. Things have been really tough lately, it's going to be so good to relax. This park seems pretty out of the way, I don't think I've heard of it before and it's quite a drive to get to the entrance. But a day trip is probably what I need, just get away from the city and see what nature has to offer. I'll be sure to bring my camera phone in case anything cool is there to see. It looks like there's a few buildings and a lighthouse on the map but I can't find any actual pictures of the park online. That's strange, but I guess it makes sense given how far off the highway it is. Maybe when I get back home I'll upload my photos to share!

Controls Moving the player InputActionWASDMove character
ShiftRunSpaceJumpEscapeToggle pause menu
Using the Camera InputActionMove Mouse
Moves the camera / Look around
Right Click
Toggles Camera to take photo
Left Click
When camera toggled, takes photograph

Full  credits can be found inside credits.txt.
